attributes.additional_details: I could guarantee that if you walked to your local supermarket at this very moment, you can find many fresh foods of which are labelled: 'Origin: Israeli Settlement' Israel are occupying Palestinian territories in the Gaza Strip and West Bank, and are selling natural resources that soley belong to Pallestine. It is about time that Britain and the EU stopped funding Israel's aggressive campaign against the Palestinian people. I have no racial or religious influences in setting this petition up, but believe such actions are morally wrong, and if something happend of a simillar situation in Europe, the UN, EU and Nato would be over it like a rash.
